articles.title: Covid-19: 40 new deaths, 585 additional cases recorded in South Africa - News24
articles.description: According to the National Institute for Communicable Diseases, South Africa has recorded 585 new Covid-19 cases. According to the Department of Health, 24 471 210 vaccines have been administered.
articles.content:
• South Africa has recorded 585 new cases of Covid-19.
  • Forty new deaths have been recorded, bringing the death toll to 89 555.
  • Gauteng accounted for 33% of the new cases.
